scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run tree; cp videos/* build/videos; npm run images; npm run scripts; npm run styles
scripts.clean: rm -f build/images/*; rm -f build/scripts/*; rm -f build/styles/*; rm -f npm-debug.log
scripts.styles: node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --include-path vendor/bourbon/app/assets/stylesheets --output-style compressed styles/major.scss build/styles/major.css; node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --include-path vendor/bourbon/app/assets/stylesheets --output-style compressed styles/minor.scss build/styles/minor.css
scripts.tree: mkdir -p build/styles; mkdir -p build/scripts; mkdir -p build/images; mkdir -p build/videos
